item.title: What means
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

It checks if the AtkType var is equal to 0, 1, or 2, then it will carry out that action.

Read full topic

item.title: What means
item.dc:creator: @mod_lol1 mod_lol1
item.description:
@mod_lol1 wrote:

what means this in npc/npchandler class:
if (AtkType == 0)
else if (AtkType == 1)
else if (AtkType == 2)

under that attacktypes are codes like:

case 2631: p.createProjectile(absY + (int)(size / 2), absX + (int)(size / 2), offsetY, offsetX, 443, 43, 31, 65, -StartKilling-1); hitDiff2 = misc.random(MaxHit); if (AtkStr <= rangeDef) { hitDiff2 = 0; } StartAnimation(GetRangeEmote()); AtkDelay = 3; ActionTimer = 5; break;
So what means it if I add the code under the attacktype 0 1 or 2?

Read full topic
